comment.author: 79833224@N00
comment._content:
Morris Charles Rath
Positions: Second Baseman and Third Baseman 
Bats: Left, Throws: Right 
Height: 5' 8", Weight: 160 lb.
Born: December 25, 1886 in Mobeetie, TX (All Transactions)
Debut: September 28, 1909 
Teams (by GP): Reds/WhiteSox/Athletics/Naps 1909-1920
Final Game: October 3, 1920 
Died: November 18, 1945 in Upper Darby, PA 
Buried: Arlington Cemetery,in Drexel Hill, PA
